item.title: Basic help! read please :s
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello everyone. Look at my command for ::exp lock and ::exp unlock

if(command.startsWith("exp")) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); if(cmd[1].equals("lock")) lockExp = true; if(cmd[1].equals("unlock")) lockExp = false; }
There we go. Now the problem:
How do I make the lockExp = true; actually lock the exp.
How do I declare that it does that? If you know the solution please post or PM! Preferably post. If you know where to add it also please post that also! Thanks in advance to all posters!

Read full topic
